about_the_game:
The demon king has risen from beyond the realm, heralding the end of humanity. In a post-yokai apocalypse, only demon hunters stand between the demon king's army and whats left of humanity.

Demon legend is a fast paced, action platformer metroidvania with dynamic player swapping action and a cast of varied characters.

Control several demon hunters and swap between them at will, chaining abilities together.

Hunt down yokai for coin and profit. Upgrade your arsenal in merchant shops and purchase new abilities.

Help defend humanity's last villages from large yokai bosses that serve the demon king.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 Service Pack 1 or newer (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel core i5-4210 1.7ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4400
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Onboard soundcard or better

short_description: Demon legend is a fast paced action platformer metroidvania set in a post-yokai apocalypse with dynamic player swapping and chainable abilities from a varied cast of characters. Hunt demons for profit, crush large yokai bosses that serve the demon king, and defend humanity from extinction.
